org.wildfly.swarm.config.management

Class SecurityRealm<T extends SecurityRealm<T>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.wildfly.swarm.config.management.SecurityRealm<T>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    EnhancedSecurityRealm

    public class SecurityRealm<T extends SecurityRealm<T>>
extends Object
    A security realm that can be associated with a management interface and used to control access to the management services.

      • propertiesAuthentication

        public T propertiesAuthentication(PropertiesAuthentication value)
        Configuration to use a list users stored within a properties file as the user repository. The entries within the properties file are username={credentials} with each user being specified on it's own line.

      • propertiesAuthentication

        public T propertiesAuthentication(PropertiesAuthenticationConsumer consumer)

      • propertiesAuthorization

        public T propertiesAuthorization(PropertiesAuthorization value)
        Configuration to use properties file to load a users roles. The entries within the properties file are username={roles} where roles is a comma separated list of users roles.

      • propertiesAuthorization

        public T propertiesAuthorization(PropertiesAuthorizationConsumer consumer)
        Configuration to use properties file to load a users roles. The entries within the properties file are username={roles} where roles is a comma separated list of users roles.
